heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered showers and possibly a thunderstorm, tapering off in the far south. Highs from the mid 50s to around 60. Southeast winds 5 to 10 mph, becoming south.

heading: Tonight
text: Any showers north tapering off, except lingering in the Adirondacks, with some summit-level snow showers possible there; otherwise partial clearing, mainly southeast. Lows from the upper 30s to mid 40s. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly cloudy, except partly cloudy southeast. Showers likely near and north of Route 4, chance to the south; snow showers possible over the northern mountains summits. Valley highs in the mid to upper 50s for southeastern valleys, upper 40s to mid 50s elsewhere. South to southwest winds 5 to 15 mph.
